name: Inversion (itch) (SquiggelSquirrel)
description:
Made for Godot WildJam #39, with the theme of "Inversion", I aimed for the "Mobile Friendly" wildcard, so this should be playable on a touchscreen in-browser.

(Please let me know if you encounter any issues, this is only my second game and I can't test on every device & OS)
